Articles.Content:
Dear all,

I loaded up steam and found this:

So, I'm asking for suggestions on what kind of mission I should do over my live stream to celebrate this momentous occasion?

(mods include but not limited too: New FusTek beta release, KSO Phase 2, TAC Life Support, FAR, DREC, HomeGrown, KAS, Kethane, and a scad of visual enhancements and UI interface stuff)

Find me on Twitch.tv @ : Rottielover "Rottie's Rockets"

P.S. I don't have an exact scheduled showtime yet. I may have a RL obligation tonight, so the stream will be up either around 7 pm Central Time, or 9 pm Central Time, or I may have to postpone till later in the week (I hope not).

Hope to see you on to help me celebrate!
